title: About me
content: I learned coding with php several years ago, when Internet was still young. For multiple reasons, i had stopped then and missed most of this new Internet i'm discovering once again. So, i feel like a newbie again and since i'm ready to start over personal project, i'll share with you some of my discoveries. Beyond coding topics, i'll enjoy sharing with you several subjects such as History, Astronomy, Linguistics, Movies, Books, Music and Anime among others. I hope you'll enjoy reading this blog.
